comments.author: Dauni.8290
comments.body:
Well. One big Problem is here:

Eye of Zaithan / Pre(Defend the Pact team as they search Zho’qafa Catacombs for artifacts)-EventID: 42884028-C274-4DFA-A493-E750B8E1B353

Server 2201: NOT found
Server 2201: Found

So. The Event was yesterday marked as found@2201(Kodash).. Whats wrong?

comments.author: stemare.2578
comments.body:
The Talcmaster.7391:

Ah, my bad. Yes, it should show any events that any player on any world has ever come across. Maybe it’s possible for an event to be occuring and nobody to have encountered it yet?

This is a valid point, in fact i saw the event list reset about 1hour and a half ago and slowly getting populated.

comments.author: The Talcmaster.7391
comments.body: Ah, my bad. Yes, it should show any events that any player on any world has ever come across. Maybe it’s possible for an event to be occuring and nobody to have encountered it yet?

comments.author: stemare.2578
comments.body:
The Talcmaster.7391:

It is possible for events to be in a completely inactive state and not show up in the list at all. So not all servers will report the same number of events at the same time.

I’m talking about event names list, not event states. There should be listed all events in the game.

comments.author: AlSquire.9203
comments.body: I’m talking about the API in general, with wvw matches and even worlds sometime missing. I suppose there is some behind the scene work going on right now.

comments.author: The Talcmaster.7391
comments.body: It is possible for events to be in a completely inactive state and not show up in the list at all. So not all servers will report the same number of events at the same time.

comments.author: AlSquire.9203
comments.body: A have a lot of erratic returns with missing lines since the last hour or so.

comments.author: stemare.2578
comments.body:
The Talcmaster.7391:

That skritt burglar event description is used for different events that occur in several different maps in the game. That is perfectly reasonable output

Still, some events are missing from the list.

comments.author: stemare.2578
comments.body:
